version_description:
We've fixed a bug, making it easier to use the features we released in the last app update:

• Make one off payments up to £250 to any UK account without a card reader.

• Our Pay your contacts service now also supports paying any mobile number which is registered for the Paym service.

• iPhone customers can now search by name for a specific payee when making a payment.

• iPad customers will now be able to apply for a savings account or ISA directly from the app.

To prepare for upcoming enhancements to the app, you may have to confirm your mobile number and enter an activation code as part of this update.

We've fixed a bug, making it easier to use the features we released in the last app update:

• Make one off payments up to £250 to any UK account without a card reader.

• Our Pay your contacts service now also supports paying any mobile number which is registered for the Paym service.

• iPhone customers can now search by name for a specific payee when making a payment.

• iPad customers will now be able to apply for a savings account or ISA directly from the app.

To prepare for upcoming enhancements to the app, you may have to confirm your mobile number and enter an activation code as part of this update.

This time round we have made the following changes on the iPhone app:

• We have launched an app for Apple Watch! Visit the More menu in your iPhone app for further information.

• iPhone customers can now search from a list of approved utility and service providers to make bill payments.

This time round we have made the following changes on the iPhone app:

• We have launched an app for Apple Watch! Visit the More menu in your iPhone app for further information.

• iPhone customers can now search from a list of approved utility and service providers to make bill payments.

This time round we have made the following changes on the iPhone app:

• We have fixed a bug affecting Pay your contacts following the release of iOS9
• You can make one off payee reference changes when making payments

This time round we have made the following changes on the iPad app:

• You can now view standing orders and Direct Debits that you have set up in the iPad app.
• Make new one off payments up to £250 to any UK account using a sort code and account number without a card reader

This time round we have made the following changes on the iPhone app:

• We have fixed a bug affecting Pay your contacts following the release of iOS9
• You can make one off payee reference changes when making payments

This time round we have made the following changes on the iPad app:

• You can now view standing orders and Direct Debits that you have set up in the iPad app.
• Make new one off payments up to £250 to any UK account using a sort code and account number without a card reader

This time round we have made the following changes to the app:

You can now

- Cancel a standing order or Direct Debit directly from the app
Check your Rewards balance if you’ve already registered as a My Rewards customer

And finally… Following your feedback we have optimised the app so it works better on larger screens.

This time round we have made the following changes to the app:

You can now

- Cancel a standing order or Direct Debit directly from the app
Check your Rewards balance if you’ve already registered as a My Rewards customer

And finally… Following your feedback we have optimised the app so it works better on larger screens.

This time round we have made the following changes to the app.

You can now:

- Apply for a Loan or Credit Card directly from the app – visit Our Products in the More menu.
- See more detail in your transaction history.

To continue using the app on your Apple Watch please update your iPhone to iOS 9 or later and your Apple Watch to watchOS 2 or later.

This time round we have made the following changes to the app.

You can now:

- Apply for a Loan or Credit Card directly from the app – visit Our Products in the More menu.
- See more detail in your transaction history.

To continue using the app on your Apple Watch please update your iPhone to iOS 9 or later and your Apple Watch to watchOS 2 or later.

Thanks for banking with NatWest!

With this update you can now:

•Set up standing orders on your account on both iPhone and iPad
•Edit the names of your accounts to personalise your banking experience
•View your Customer Number – this is the number we use to identify you when you log in to Online Banking and for authentication when you call us

Your feedback is important to us; if you love our app, tell us by leaving a review on the app store or send us a tweet @NatWest_Help using #NatWestApp. If you have any suggestions to make the app even better let us know on our community forum http://communities.natwest.com.

Thanks for banking with NatWest!

With this update you can now:

•Set up standing orders on your account on both iPhone and iPad
•Edit the names of your accounts to personalise your banking experience
•View your Customer Number – this is the number we use to identify you when you log in to Online Banking and for authentication when you call us

Your feedback is important to us; if you love our app, tell us by leaving a review on the app store or send us a tweet @NatWest_Help using #NatWestApp. If you have any suggestions to make the app even better let us know on our community forum http://communities.natwest.com.

Thanks for banking with NatWest!

• With this update you can use 3D Touch to access features from your home screen on compatible phones.

• We're here to help, visit our new Support Centre in the More Menu.

• We are proud to be the first bank in the UK to offer a RNIB Approved App for use by blind and partially sighted customers.

Your feedback is important to us; if you love our app, tell us by leaving a review on the app store or send us a tweet @NatWest_Help using #NatWestApp. If you have any thoughts or suggestions regarding our new menu layout or icons let us know on our community forum http://communities.natwest.com.

Thanks for banking with NatWest!

This time around we’ve made the following updates to the iPhone app:

Change to one of our Reward accounts directly from the app and earn 3% back in Rewards on household bills paid by Direct Debit.

iPad customers can now view their Customer Number as well as their pending and available Rewards balance.

Your feedback is important to us; if you love our app, tell us by leaving a review on the app store or send us a tweet @NatWest_Help using #NatWestApp. If you have any suggestions to make the app even better let us know on our community forum http://communities.natwest.com.

Thanks for banking with NatWest!

Thanks for banking with NatWest!

This time around we’ve made the following updates to the iPhone app:

• Share your account details so people can pay you directly in to your account
• Get Cash has a new look and feel and will now show the location of your nearest ATM
• Choose which account information to display on your Apple Watch

iPad customers can now log in to the app using Touch ID

Your feedback is important to us; if you love our app, tell us by leaving a review on the app store or send us a tweet @NatWest_Help using #NatWestApp. If you have any suggestions to make the app even better let us know on our community forum http://communities.natwest.com.

Thanks for banking with NatWest!

• Get Cash has a new look and feel and will now show the location of your nearest ATM
• Choose which account information to display on your Apple Watch

iPad customers can now log in to the app using Touch ID

Your feedback is important to us; if you love our app, tell us by leaving a review on the app store or send us a tweet @NatWest_Help using #NatWestApp. If you have any suggestions to make the app even better let us know on our community forum http://communities.natwest.com.

Thanks for banking with NatWest!

This time around we’ve made the following updates to the iPhone app:

•Change details of Standing Orders which have been set up on your accounts
•View your overdraft limit when checking your accounts
•Hide your balance and reorder your account to personalise your app
•See more information about your transactions
•Share a confirmation after sending a payment or setting up a Standing Order
•Use your app across more devices using the same details.

Your feedback is important to us; if you love our app, tell us by leaving a review on the app store or send us a tweet @NatWest_Help using #NatWestApp. If you have any suggestions to make the app even better let us know on our community forum http://communities.natwest.com.

Thanks for banking with NatWest!

This time around we’ve made the following updates to the app:

•Transactions have been made easier to recognise, tap a transaction to see useful information.
•Going abroad? Let us know by setting up a travel plan in the More Menu. You'll reduce the likelihood of your debit card being blocked while you're away.
•Want to know more about a feature? Visit Show Me How in the more menu for tutorials of features in the app.

Your feedback is important to us; if you love our app, tell us by leaving a review on the app store or send us a tweet @NatWest_Help using #NatWestApp. If you have any suggestions to make the app even better let us know on our community forum http://communities.natwest.com.

Thanks for banking with NatWest!

This time around we’ve made the following updates to the app:

•See your remaining ISA allowance to ensure you make full use of your tax free allowance.
•View or change the alerts you receive by email or text so that you stay in control of your finances.

• Send international payments to payees you have set up in online banking
• Download a copy of individual transactions for your records

Your feedback is important to us; if you love our app, tell us by leaving a review on the app store or send us a tweet @NatWest_Help using #NatWestApp.

• Send international payments to payees you have set up in online banking
• Download a copy of individual transactions for your records

Thanks for your feedback, because of this we've addressed an issue which was stopping the iPad from launching for some customers, we've also fixed an issue affecting some customers using Pay Your Contacts.

Thanks for banking with NatWest!

Here are the most current updates to NatWest’s mobile banking app:

•The next time you use the app we will greet you by name, if you would like to change your greeting visit settings.
•Our Products tab has grown, it now includes Business Banking products
•iPad Customers can now send international payments to payees set up on Online Banking

Your feedback is important to us. If you love our app, please tell us by leaving a review on the app store or by tweeting @NatWest_Help using #NatWestApp.

Thanks for banking with NatWest!

•Our Products tab has grown, it now includes Business Banking products

Thanks for your feedback, because of this we’ve addressed an issue which was affecting the order of transactions for some customers when the language of their device wasn’t set to English.

Thanks for banking with NatWest!

Here are the most current updates to NatWest’s mobile banking app:

•We’ll keep you posted on getting the best out of your app and keeping on top of your finances, visit Notifications in the new Profile menu
•Our iPad app has a new look and feel and we've introduced a few new features

If you have personalised your app greeting, it may be reset with this update – you can change it by visiting settings in the new profile menu.

Your feedback is important to us. If you love our app, please tell us by leaving a review on the app store or by tweeting @NatWest_Help using #NatWestApp.

Thanks for banking with NatWest!

Thanks for banking with NatWest.

Here’s an early festive treat from us:

• Our app is now optimised for the iPhone X and you can use Face ID to access your accounts
• We’ve made a few improvements to payments, you can now save and delete payees as well as schedule payments for a future date
• Manage all of your business accounts in one app, visit the profile menu to add a business

Thanks for banking with NatWest.

Here’s an early festive treat from us:

• Our app is now optimised for the iPhone X and you can use Face ID to access your accounts
• We’ve made a few improvements to payments, you can now save and delete payees as well as schedule payments for a future date
• Manage all of your business accounts in one app, visit the profile menu to add a business

Thanks for banking with NatWest.

With this release:

•You can manage your Credit Card with a range of new features, including unblocking your PIN and ordering a PIN reminder
•You can view and cancel your scheduled payments from the new payments hub
•We’ve refreshed our app and updated our navigation to make it easier for you to manage your everyday tasks

Thanks for banking with NatWest.

With this release:

•Schedule transfers between your NatWest accounts for a future date.
•View personalised lending offers in the ‘Apply’ menu.
•Business current account customers will be able to capture, store, export and manage receipts in the app.

With this release:

•You can manage your Credit Card with a range of new features, including unblocking your PIN and ordering a PIN reminder
•You can view and cancel your scheduled payments from the new payments hub
•We’ve refreshed our app and updated our navigation to make it easier for you to manage your everyday tasks

• If you have a MasterCard credit card, you can now lock & unlock your card at anytime, giving you more control over your spending.
• You can now amend the date and amount of your scheduled payments from the new payments hub in the app.
• You’ll be able to briefly switch between apps while remaining logged in. Find out more within settings.

• If you have a MasterCard credit card, you can now lock & unlock your card at anytime, giving you more control over your spending.
• You can now amend the date and amount of your scheduled payments from the new payments hub in the app.
• You’ll be able to briefly switch between apps while remaining logged in. Find out more within settings.
• We’ve refreshed our app! Giving you a fresh new look and feel, making everyday tasks clear and simple.
• We’ve refreshed our app! Giving you a fresh new look and feel, making everyday tasks clear and simple.

• Switch off paper statements for your MasterCard credit card account , you can also view and share your credit card statements as a PDF. Giving you quick, easy access on the go.
• Request to increase or decrease your credit card limit, you can find it in your credit card menu. Giving you more control of your borrowing.

• Tell us you are going abroad so that your MasterCard credit card is not blocked while you’re away, you can cancel and amend at any time (if your plans change), helping you enjoy your holiday, with one less thing to worry about.
• Access your certificate of interest in the new ‘Documents’ section of your current and savings account menu where you can view and share as a PDF.
• Report your debit card lost and order a replacement, you can also request a PIN reminder. Helping you manage your cards, simply.

• Set yourself a daily or monthly budget on your credit card, helping you to keep track of your spending.
• Report your credit card lost and order a replacement. Helping you manage your cards, simply.

• Set yourself a daily or monthly budget on your credit card, helping you to keep track of your spending.
• Report your credit card lost and order a replacement. Helping you manage your cards, simply.

• Lock and unlock your debit card at any time, giving you greater control of your card when you need it the most.
• You can now order travel money through the app, with access to our latest exchange rates.
• Your account view will now display the type of current account you have with us and show you it’s related features.
• Choose to lock gambling transactions on your credit card, giving you more control of your credit card spending.
• Add accounts that you hold with other banks into the app to view all of your finances in one place.

• Setup an Instalment Plan to repay a Credit card purchase over a set period of six to twenty four months for eligible purchases between £300 - £3000. Any eligible purchases will show in your transaction list.
• You can now manage your credit limit in your app, and where eligible we will show you how much you can increase your limit too. The actual limit will depend on the credit check we do on the day you apply.
• Your profile will now display more information about you. You will see your name, first line of your address, phone number and email address.

We regularly update our app with new features, improvements and behind the scenes changes so that you can bank quickly, simply and securely. Head to the ‘Show Me’ section in ‘Help’ to find out what’s new and what we’re working on.

• Lock and unlock your debit card at any time, giving you greater control of your card when you need it the most.
• You can now order travel money through the app, with access to our latest exchange rates.
• Your account view will now display the type of current account you have with us and show you it’s related features.
• Choose to lock gambling transactions on your credit card, giving you more control of your credit card spending.
• Add accounts that you hold with other banks into the app to view all of your finances in one place.

• Setup an Instalment Plan to repay a Credit card purchase over a set period of six to twenty four months for eligible purchases between £300 - £3000. Any eligible purchases will show in your transaction list.
• You can now manage your credit limit in your app, and where eligible we will show you how much you can increase your limit too. The actual limit will depend on the credit check we do on the day you apply.
• Your profile will now display more information about you. You will see your name, first line of your address, phone number and email address.

We regularly update our app with new features, improvements and behind the scenes changes so that you can bank quickly, simply and securely. Head to the ‘Show Me’ section in ‘Help’ to find out what’s new and what we’re working on.

• View accounts you hold with other banks in your app to see balances and transactions for all of your current accounts in one place. You can add and remove accounts quickly and securely from within the app.
• Choose to lock certain transaction types on your credit card in ‘Lock card settings’, giving you more control of your spending.
• Set up a Direct Debit to pay your credit card bill in the ‘Pay my card’ section of your credit card, saving you the worry of late or missed payments.
• Create, amend or delete a savings goal, view your progress to see what you’ve saved and how much more you need to reach your target.

• View accounts you hold with other banks in your app to see balances and transactions for all of your current accounts in one place. You can add and remove accounts quickly and securely from within the app.
• Choose to lock certain transaction types on your credit card in ‘Lock card settings’, giving you more control of your spending.
• Set up a Direct Debit to pay your credit card bill in the ‘Pay my card’ section of your credit card, saving you the worry of late or missed payments.
• Create, amend or delete a savings goal, view your progress to see what you’ve saved and how much more you need to reach your target.

• We may ask you to confirm your mobile number and enter an activation code to continue making transfers between your accounts and payments to your saved payees. This is a one off activation for security purposes and it is to ensure that we have the right mobile number for you.
• Pay your contacts is changing. You can still send money to someone using their mobile number through Pay your contacts, however in order to receive payments into your RBS account you need to be registered for Paym. Not registered? You can sign up in ‘My Profile’ through ‘Paym registration’.
• Create, amend or delete a savings goal. View your progress, see what you’ve saved and how much more you need to reach your target. Save monthly by setting up a standing order to help keep you on track.

• We may ask you to confirm your mobile number and enter an activation code to continue making transfers between your accounts and payments to your saved payees. This is a one off activation for security purposes and it is to ensure that we have the right mobile number for you.
• Pay your contacts is changing. You can still send money to someone using their mobile number through Pay your contacts, however in order to receive payments into your RBS account you need to be registered for Paym. Not registered? You can sign up in ‘My Profile’ through ‘Paym registration’.
• Create, amend or delete a savings goal. View your progress, see what you’ve saved and how much more you need to reach your target. Save monthly by setting up a standing order to help keep you on track.

• Setup an Instalment Plan to repay a Credit card purchase over a set period of six to twenty four months for eligible purchases between £300 - £3000. Any eligible purchases will show in your transaction list.
• You can now manage your credit limit in your app, and where eligible we will show you how much you can increase your limit too. The actual limit will depend on the credit check we do on the day you apply.
• Your profile will now display more information about you. You will see your name, first line of your address, phone number and email address.

• Setup an Instalment Plan to repay a Credit card purchase over a set period of six to twenty four months for eligible purchases between £300 - £3000. Any eligible purchases will show in your transaction list.
• You can now manage your credit limit in your app, and where eligible we will show you how much you can increase your limit too. The actual limit will depend on the credit check we do on the day you apply.
• Your profile will now display more information about you. You will see your name, first line of your address, phone number and email address.

• Authorise payments over a certain amount via the same way you choose to log into the app, continuing to keep you safe and secure.
• You won’t always be able to see some of the changes we make. Just so you know, behind the scenes we’ve doing a lot of work to ensure you get the best out of our app!

• Authorise payments over a certain amount via the same way you choose to log into the app, continuing to keep you safe and secure.
• You won’t always be able to see some of the changes we make. Just so you know, behind the scenes we’ve doing a lot of work to ensure you get the best out of our app!

• Lock and unlock your debit card at any time, giving you greater control of your card when you need it the most.
• You can now order travel money through the app, with access to our latest exchange rates.
• Your account view will now display the type of current account you have with us and show you it’s related features.
• Choose to lock gambling transactions on your credit card, giving you more control of your credit card spending.
• Add accounts that you hold with other banks into the app to view all of your finances in one place.

• You can now see your credit score in the app. Visit your profile (top right icon on home screen) to view it now!
• To help prevent scams, we will work with other banks to check that when you make a payment, the payee's name matches the account number provided.

• We’re changing the way you view your current account balance, by separating your arranged overdraft from your own funds.
• Mortgage only customers can now register for the app. Through the app you’ll be able to access the Manage My Mortgage portal. This provides the ability to change or cancel overpayments, check your mortgage balance, request a mortgage payment holiday and have the ability to research and select a new deal on the mortgage.

• We’re changing the way you view your current account balance, by separating your arranged overdraft from your own funds.
• Mortgage only customers can now register for the app. Through the app you’ll be able to access the Manage My Mortgage portal. This provides the ability to change or cancel overpayments, check your mortgage balance, request a mortgage payment holiday and have the ability to research and select a new deal on the mortgage.

• We’re making it easier for you to browse and identify transactions.
• Want to access your MyRewards on the go? We’ve removed the need for another password! You can access your MyRewards directly via the app to redeem your Rewards and view your personalised offers.
